= 信息管理 =
<p>
	1. 快速添加</p>
<p>
	从左侧管理菜单点击快速添加进入。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085629_pJte_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085629_pJte_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085710_0SsQ_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085710_0SsQ_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085726_M0xS_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085726_M0xS_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0426/123653_03CG_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0426/123653_03CG_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085739_EliD_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085739_EliD_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	输入相关属性后添加&ldquo;保存&rdquo;按钮即可。</p>
<p>
	2. 添加信息</p>
<p>
	从左侧管理菜单点击信息管理进入信息管理页面。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085803_O1hF_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085803_O1hF_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	进入指定栏目，点击&ldquo;添加&rdquo;按钮</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085815_OrBt_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085815_OrBt_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085829_ykIG_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085829_ykIG_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085840_Pb99_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085840_Pb99_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0426/123653_03CG_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0426/123653_03CG_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085851_L0Q8_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085851_L0Q8_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	输入相关属性后添加&ldquo;保存&rdquo;按钮即可。</p>
<p>
	提示：使用此处的添加信息，栏目会默认设置为当前栏目。</p>
<p>
	3. 编辑信息</p>
<p>
	进入指定栏目，选择需要编辑的信息，点击&ldquo;编辑&rdquo;按钮。</p>
<p>
	注意：同时只能对一条信息进行编辑操作。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085905_Ig5U_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085905_Ig5U_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085917_6O8X_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085917_6O8X_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085931_MScc_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085931_MScc_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085944_9vpf_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085944_9vpf_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0426/123653_03CG_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0426/123653_03CG_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085957_77IK_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/085957_77IK_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	输入相关属性后添加&ldquo;保存&rdquo;按钮即可。</p>
<p>
	4. 删除信息</p>
<p>
	进入指定栏目，选择需要删除的信息，点击&ldquo;删除&rdquo;按钮。</p>
<p>
	提示：同时可以选择多条信息进行删除操作。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090009_sTdb_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090009_sTdb_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090027_Gg45_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090027_Gg45_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	为防止用户误操作，系统会提示用户确认，点击&ldquo;确定&rdquo;按钮即可。</p>
<p>
	5. 签收统计</p>
<p>
	从FreeCMS 1.2 开始支持。</p>
<p>
	在信息列表中可以查看那些是签收信息。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090040_bg0d_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090040_bg0d_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	点击&rdquo;是&rdquo;链接查看签收统计结果，可以查看需要签收的用户，用户是否已经过此信息及签收时间和<span>IP</span><span>。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090051_Fu31_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0301/090051_Fu31_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
